title: net/http http.FileServer directory list error on windows
body:
code :http.ListenAndServe(":80",http.FileServer(http.Dir("./")))

  build the exe and copy that to two different directory,which call one and two.open one exe and refresh browser, the list right. close one open two, refresh browser, the list right,but close two and open one ,the browser list not refresh, which just show pre list.
